section.text: *NOTE: This section includes amendments by emergency legislation that will expire on February 22, 2026. To view the text of this section after the expiration of all emergency and temporary legislation, click this link: Permanent Version.*
section.heading: Collection services at private collection properties.
section.text: Private collection properties shall enter into contracts with collectors of solid waste to receive services not less than twice per week at each property; provided that contracts may authorize less frequent collection during weeks where a District holiday or hazardous weather conditions prevent multiple collections.

annotations.annotation: Applicability of D.C. Law 25-297: § 4 of D.C. Law 25-297 provided that the creation of this section by § 2(b) of D.C. Law 25-297 is subject to the inclusion of the law’s fiscal effect in an approved budget and financial plan. Therefore that amendment has not been implemented.

Section 7191 of D.C. Act 26-146 amended Section 4 of D.C. Law 25-297, thus removing the applicability limitation. Therefore the creation of this section by §2(b) of D.C. Law 25-297 has been implemented.
For temporary (90 days) amendment of this section, see § 7191(a) of Fiscal Year 2026 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2025 (D.C. Act 26-146, Sept. 3, 2025, 72 DCR 9623).

Section 7191 of D.C. Act 26-210 amended Section 4 of D.C. Law 25-297, thus removing the applicability limitation. Therefore the creation of this section by §2(b) of D.C. Law 25-297 has been implemented.
For temporary (90 days) amendment of this section, see § 7191(a) of Fiscal Year 2026 Budget Support Congressional Review Emergency Act of 2025 (D.C. Act 26-210, Nov. 24, 2025, 0 DCR 0).
